name: Into the DEEP (alexthebear, Gnolfo, vertexfragment)
description:
Into the DEEP

A game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48 - DEEPER AND DEEPER

What, you think there's treasure in the water? For real? Ha! Ha! Ha!

Sure, I'll take you out there as far as you want to go.

... I get a cut, right?

FEATURES:

Exciting rhythm game action!

3 levels of increasing difficulty!

Fully animated 3D cutscenes!

HOW TO PLAY:

- Tap SPACE rhythmically to build momentum and dive deep

- Use ARROWS or WASD to move

- Use SHIFT for boost

====================

Music: https://www.purple-planet.com
